email_subject: Follow-up on GraphConnect and Upcoming SIGAPP Event
email_body:
Hi Ray,

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to follow up on the insightful discussions at GraphConnect. I understand your interest in the evolving field of cyber security, and it was great to learn that you attended the conference.

I wanted to share with you an interesting work by Gale Robinson titled 'An Ontology for Cyber Security'. It would be great to discuss this further and expand our views on the topic.

On another note, there is an upcoming event that Gale will attend, the SIGAPP conference. It's a valuable opportunity for us to gain more insights from prominent industry figures.

Please let us know if you're interested in attending SIGAPP and I can help facilitate your registration. Click here to indicate your interest.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Kind regards,
